query: WITH entities AS (SELECT approval_process_type, id FROM process_assignments WHERE ((approval_process_type, id) > ($3, $2)) OR $2 IS NULL ORDER BY approval_process_type, id LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: ProcessAssignmentId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN process_assignment_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.approval_process_type, i.id, i.id, e.sequence
